ValidationRule.description: Where Stage = 3. Solution or 4. Post-Submission require Description to be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, RecordType.DeveloperName = "Lite_Opportunity", OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "3. Solution"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "4. Post-Submission") ), ISBLANK(Description) )
